means: 使显得威严( dignify的现在分词 )

list.abs: 猎狼哪个漂亮 ... Carries himself in a calm,dignified manner 持有冷静，威严的态度 Is polite with people 对人有礼貌.
I hope you are also is filial , dignified girl ., 我希望你也是位孝顺 , 端庄的女孩.
her dignified bearing throughout the trial made everyone believe she was innocent .在整个审讯的过程中，她那端庄的举止使得每个人都相信她是无辜的。

the palatial dignified construction main body , is located in carpet of green grass , the flowers and trees luxuriant Zhongshan Park , becomes east Taibei an area radiant star ;巍峨庄严的建筑本体，座落在绿草如茵，花木扶疏的中山公园，成为台北东区一颗璀璨的明星；

entry.tran: 使有尊严;使变得庄严;使变得高贵
entry.def: To dignify something means to make it impressive.

example.ex: Tragic literature dignifies sorrow and disaster...
example.tran: 悲剧作品使悲伤和灾难得到了升华。

example.ex: The gatepost was dignified by the weathered brass plate of Dr Harcourt Sibley.
example.tran: 在那块刻有哈考特·西布利医生姓名的久经风雨的黄铜牌映衬下，门柱更增添了几分庄重。

entry.tran: 使显得堂皇;抬高…的身价;美化
entry.def: If you say that a particular reaction or description dignifies something you have a low opinion of, you mean that it makes it appear acceptable.

example.ex: We won't dignify this kind of speculation with a comment...
example.tran: 这种猜测不值得我们作任何评论。

example.ex: It was a technique later dignified by the term 'info-tainment'.
example.tran: 那种技术后来被美其名曰“资讯娱乐”。

auth_sentence.content: Once we get to that point, that baseline point, then we can start talking about actually dignifying civilian harm, she said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once we get to that point, that baseline point, then we can start talking about actually dignifying civilian harm, she said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once we get to that point, that baseline point, then we can start talking about actually dignifying civilian harm, she said.

auth_sentence.content: Then the two apprentices thanked the Master for dignifying them with his attention and respectfully took their leave.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then the two apprentices thanked the Master for dignifying them with his attention and respectfully took their leave.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then the two apprentices thanked the Master for dignifying them with his attention and respectfully took their leave.

auth_sentence.content: Some questions are so baseless and have such defamatory implication I don't feel they deserve dignifying.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some questions are so baseless and have such defamatory implication I don't feel they deserve dignifying.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some questions are so baseless and have such defamatory implication I don't feel they deserve dignifying.
